reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and feminine, with a perfect fit and soft texture.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cider women's off shoulder knitted long sleeve sweater
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater! It was the perfect length for me since I am petite. Soft and such a pretty pink! I received many compliments! I wore with black leggings and boots. I would definitely order again in another color! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s very cute! Size up!
items.body: It was really cute! I had to return it because while it wasn’t necessarily too small or too loose, but the part that wraps over the shoulders kept pulling up and I would constantly have to fix it every time I moved, which was super annoying to do when taking professional photos. It wasn’t too itchy, I would recommend wearing a tank under it, but it never ripped and it kept its shape even after hours of wear. Read more
items.author: Kenny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweet and Pink
items.body: This is beautiful , feminine and fits perfectly I was skeptical because of the reviews. I’m so happy I bought it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Color
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous! My favorite top to wear and my favorite color. Wore it for Galentine’s and a baby shower. So pretty and feminine and soft! Read more
items.author: Lauren G.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater but cheap quality!
items.body: Looked so cute!! Loved the style!! I had a snag get caught the first time wearing it, though, and now have a giant hole and am unable to wear it again:( but super cute! Read more
items.author: Morgyn Rollans

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cheap material
items.body: Purchased white, looked cute but the material was thin and you could see through it. Returned it. Read more
items.author: Andrew M Frick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute top!!
items.body: I love this sweater because it gives off a sophisticated look without feeling itchy or irritating the skin. Very affordable price for a great basic! Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fought it all night.
items.body: This sweater is so cute. It fit well and wasn’t too long or short. I didn’t find it itchy at all. I couldn’t , however, get it to stay in place on my shoulders. It rode up and didn’t stay folded at the appropriate level. I might try tacking it down to help. I am larger busted, so maybe that was a factor. Read more
items.author: Southern Small Town Mrs

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Pink, Cream, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
